job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a Senior ML Platform Engineer - DataOps to help R&D manage large data-sets of audio-video data at Synthesia. We are creating a new ML Platform team, that will be supporting 7+ teams developing cutting edge solutions in generative video synthesis. You will join us to set up a world class data function, managing a lake with PB scale data and building complex audio/visual data pipelines to bring order and make data consumption simple. You are going to super-charge our research., In this position, you will set up and provide data management for our ML teams in R&D at Synthesia. You will help set up our audio-video data pipeline for the Video team and our speech data pipeline for the Voice team. You will be responsible for:
     * Data storage - our data lake for large scale audio-visual datasets
     * Data sources - set up our ingest process, working with external data providers
     * Data annotation - manage data verification and annotation, working with external providers
     * Data pipelines - deploy custom ML data transformations, working with our ML teams
     * Data access - create transient data-sets on demand to support ML model training
     * Data tracking - usage tracking and monitoring across all data sources, You will work in a hybrid setting with an office in Amsterdam
job_details.full_text:
Senior ML Platform Engineer - DataOps

We are looking for a Senior ML Platform Engineer - DataOps to help R&D manage large data-sets of audio-video data at Synthesia. We are creating a new ML Platform team, that will be supporting 7+ teams developing cutting edge solutions in generative video synthesis. You will join us to set up a world class data function, managing a lake with PB scale data and building complex audio/visual data pipelines to bring order and make data consumption simple. You are going to super-charge our research., In this position, you will set up and provide data management for our ML teams in R&D at Synthesia. You will help set up our audio-video data pipeline for the Video team and our speech data pipeline for the Voice team. You will be responsible for:
     * Data storage - our data lake for large scale audio-visual datasets
     * Data sources - set up our ingest process, working with external data providers
     * Data annotation - manage data verification and annotation, working with external providers
     * Data pipelines - deploy custom ML data transformations, working with our ML teams
     * Data access - create transient data-sets on demand to support ML model training
     * Data tracking - usage tracking and monitoring across all data sources, You will work in a hybrid setting with an office in Amsterdam

profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes data engineering, data pipelines, and managing large datasets for ML model training, aligning with the core responsibilities of an ML Engineer focused on data infrastructure and MLOps. While generative video synthesis is mentioned, the primary focus is on the data platform supporting these efforts, not the direct development of generative models themselves.

job_tasks.phrase: manage large data-sets of audio-video data
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to managing and handling large volumes of data, which is a core aspect of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: set up a world class data function
job_tasks.justification: Establishing a 'data function' implies building and managing the infrastructure and processes for data, fitting within data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: managing a lake with PB scale data
job_tasks.justification: Managing a data lake, especially at petabyte scale, is a significant data engineering responsibility.
The construction of data pipelines for processing specific types of data (audio/visual) is a key data engineering task.
Simplifying data consumption is an outcome of well-designed data pipelines and infrastructure, a goal of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: set up and provide data management for our ML teams
job_tasks.justification: Providing data management services for ML teams falls under the umbrella of data engineering, ensuring data is ready for use.

job_tasks.phrase: set up our audio-video data pipeline for the Video team and our speech data pipeline for the Voice team
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions setting up data pipelines for specific data types and teams, a direct data engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: Data storage - our data lake for large scale audio-visual datasets
job_tasks.justification: Managing data storage, specifically a data lake for large datasets, is a fundamental data engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Data sources - set up our ingest process, working with external data providers
job_tasks.justification: Setting up data ingestion processes from various sources is a crucial part of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Data annotation - manage data verification and annotation, working with external providers
job_tasks.justification: While annotation can be a separate role, managing the process and ensuring data quality for ML is often part of the data engineering lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines - deploy custom ML data transformations, working with our ML teams
job_tasks.justification: Deploying data transformation pipelines specifically for ML workflows is a core data engineering function.

job_tasks.phrase: Data access - create transient data-sets on demand to support ML model training
job_tasks.justification: Facilitating data access and creating datasets for model training is a key data engineering task that supports ML workflows.

job_tasks.phrase: Data tracking - usage tracking and monitoring across all data sources
job_tasks.justification: Tracking and monitoring data usage is a form of operational oversight for data assets, aligning with MLOps principles for data governance and lineage.

job_tasks.phrase: supporting 7+ teams developing cutting edge solutions in generative video synthesis
job_tasks.justification: Understanding the context of supporting teams developing generative video synthesis provides insight into the business domain and the purpose of the data platform.
This phrase indicates the role's contribution to the broader R&D goals and business objectives.

technologies.justification: Refers to the type of data being processed, implying the need for specific processing techniques.
Refers to the type of data being processed, implying the need for specific processing techniques.

soft_skills.justification: Indicates the need to collaborate with other technical teams (ML teams).
Requires interaction and collaboration with external parties.
Implies collaboration and communication with external entities.
